entangle.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to make something become twisted and caught in a rope, net etc
entangle.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Small animals can get entangled in the net.
entangle.translation[0].definitions[1].d: to involve someone in an argument, a relationship, or a situation that is difficult to escape from
entangle.translation[0].definitions[1].e: fears that the US could get entangled in another war
I didn’t want to become entangled with my best friend’s wife.
